entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
